title: 'Shattered' Font ID
content:
’Evening, All

I have been asked to help ID a font for a friend

He described a regular sans font that he told me looked ’shattered’

I suggested ITC Shatter ( [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/shatter/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012142145/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/shatter/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/shatter/")) but he said it was more ’subtle’ and prepared a mock-up, which I have attached

Can anyone help with a font that looks something ’in between’ the two?

Cheers!

H-NX\_

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [KASSSH.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012142145/http:/typophile.com/files/KASSSH.jpg) | 23.62 KB |

author: HANS-NIKKE_
